description:
Find the matching shapes in one of the 9 squares and win one point. Miss the match and lose a square. Make enough points to unlock the next theme.
Unlock theme to increase your skills in the challenge mode and if you dare, challenge a friend!
81 is an explosive mix of puzzle and tactics. There aren't any random moves. You have to choose carefully... And quick!
It starts easy. It becomes fast. It's Rock'n'Roll. And it's for you.

Featuring 4 game modes:

- INTRO: learn how to play in 2 little minutes
- EXPLORER: reach the goals to unlock themes. Each theme unlocked gives you more points bonuses and time in the CHALLENGE mode.
- CHALLENGE: beat your score. Beat everybody else's score. Learn your limits. Play as fast as you can. The faster the better and even more points.
- DUEL: 2 minutes to show your skills to your friend in a turn based duel. Who's the master?


Judith says 81 is as pleasant as an afternoon cup of tea. As for Craig, well... He took a pill...
Simple, full of surprises, and oh so addictive!

So it's now time, Ladies and Gentlemen, if you please, to enlighten your day with a very special game experience. You're welcome.

"Fast and efficient(...)A great job(...) The new 2048?;)"   Ankh, 81 player on the FrenchCows community.

Want to learn more about our games and meet Judith & Craig?

Please visit http://www.halfabench.com
